full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SLOB DPON YE SHES SNYING POS MDZAD PA'I BDEN PA GNYIS RNAM PAR 'BYED PA BZHUGS SO, ,
translator_(орчуулагч): SH'I LENDRA BO DHI, BANDE YE SHES SDE,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B BDEN PA GNYIS RNAM PAR GTA LA PHAB PA YANG DAG PAR MTHONG BAR BRTZON PA SLOB DPON YE SHES SNYING POS MDZAD PA RDZOGS SO,, ,,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO SH'I LENDRA BO DHI DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LO TZ'A BA BANDE YE SHES SDES BSGYUR CING ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PA'O,, ,,(BDE CHEN LHUN GRUB GLING NAS DPAR DU BSGRUBS, ,MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
